venue.name: Zen Japanese Grill and Sushi Bar

item.description:
Sushi is great not only because it's healthy and yummy, but because it's art on a plate!

I love Zen because the location (a block from the State House) can't be beat, the staff is super friendly and accommodating, and because the menu rocks. I hope you can join me!
item.how_to_find_us: Reservations are under "Heather" and we'll be seated upstairs.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Sushi in the City
